inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [30'] and [G3/40]
markings: bottom center, stamped in red: monogram
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until ?; sold to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (until d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [H GUERARD]; LRC, in pencil: [H. Guérard]; bottom edge, in pencil: [l'avenue Trudaine (Paris)]
title: Avenue Trudaine
